metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2933 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Html class in MediaWikibefore 1.19.24, 1.2x before 1.23.9, and 1.24.x before 1.24.2 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a LanguageConvertersubstitution string when using a language variant.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
